thread.title: Burlington man faces aggravated assault charges
thread.title_full: Burlington man faces aggravated assault charges - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Burlington man faces aggravated assault charges
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - A Burlington man will be in court Friday to face charges of aggravated assault. This, after police say he brandished a pellet gun and a hammer as he demanded money from a victim.
Police responded to the incident at a home on Church Street shortly before midnight. They found Eric Baker, 38, near the residence soon after the call was made to police. Baker allegedly admitted to the assault.
Police tell us the pellet gun could easily have been mistaken for a real gun.
